mapper.select: select g.item_num, g.item_name, g.item_cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, item_price, item_allnumber, item_summary, item_picture, item_date, g.item_picture, g.item_thumbImg from mall_item g inner join item_category c on g.item_cateCode = c.cateCode where g.item_cateCode = #{item_cateCode} or c.cateCodeRef = #{cateCodeRef}

select g.item_num, g.item_name, g.item_cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, item_price, item_allnumber, item_summary, item_picture, item_date, g.item_picture, g.item_thumbImg from mall_item g inner join item_category c on g.item_cateCode = c.cateCode where g.item_cateCode = #{item_cateCode}

select g.item_num, g.item_name, g.item_catecode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, item_price, item_allnumber, item_summary, item_picture, item_date, g.item_picture, g.item_thumbImg from mall_item g inner join item_category c on g.item_cateCode = c.cateCode where g.item_num = #{item_num}
mapper.insert: insert into review_board (item_num, mem_id, rbrd_num, rbrd_content, rbrd_date) values (#{item_num}, #{mem_id}, REVIEW_SEQ.nextval, #{rbrd_content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select r.item_num, r.mem_id, r.rbrd_num, r.rbrd_content, r.rbrd_date, m.mem_name from review_board r inner join member m on r.mem_id = m.mem_id where item_num = #{item_num}
mapper.insert: insert into item_wishlist(wishlist_num, mem_id, item_num, wishlist_stock) values (WISHLIST_SEQ.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{item_num}, #{wishlist_stock})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.wishlist_num desc) as num, c.wishlist_num, c.mem_id, c.item_num, c.wishlist_stock, c.wishlist_date, g.item_name, g.item_price, g.item_thumbImg from item_wishlist c inner join mall_item g on c.item_num = g.item_num where c.mem_id = #{mem_id}
